mapper.select: select id, quantity, price, deal_price, add_time, update_time, be_deleted, product_name, promotion_sn, product_id from order_item where order_id = #{id}

select id, order_sn, statusCode, consignee, mobile, message, good_price, coupon_price, freight_price, integral_price, ship_sn, ship_channel, ship_time, confirm_time, end_time, province, city, address_detail, add_time, update_time, be_deleted, promotion_id from oomall_order where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into oomall_order(order_sn, statusCode, consignee, mobile, message, good_price, coupon_price, freight_price, integral_price, ship_sn, ship_channel, ship_time, confirm_time, end_time, province, city, county , address_detail, add_time, update_time, be_deleted, quantity) values (#{orderSn},#{orderStatus}, #{consignee}, #{mobile}, #{message}, #{goodPrice}, #{couponPrice}, #{freightPrice}, #{integralPrice}, #{shipSn}, #{shipChannel}, #{shipTime}, #{confirmTime}, #{endTime}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{addressDetail}, #{addTime}, #{updateTime}, #{beDeleted},#{quantity})

insert into order_item(order_id, quantity, price, deal_price, add_time, update_time, be_deleted, product_id, product_name, promotion_sn) values
(#{item.orderId}, #{item.quantity}, #{item.price},#{item.dealPrice}, #{item.addTime}, #{item.updateTime}, #{item.beDeleted}, #{item.goodsId}, #{item.productName}, #{item.promotionSn})
